Difference between Acronis True Image Home 2011, Acronis True Image Home 2011 Plus Pack, and Acronis Backup & Recovery 10 Workstation

http://kb.acronis.com/content/7540

Created a backup using this and it did it and verified it, so far so good, but I haven't tried restoring anything.

Also, only the main Acronis True Image program is build #5519 in this torrent.  The plus pack and media add-ons are the older build 5105.

For the latest build information:

http://www.acronis.com/homecomputing/support/updates/index.html
thanks
